profile.name: Ileri
profile.description: Tech-savvy designer obsessed with clean interfaces, AI tools, and building products that slap.
goals: Build products like Google and Microsoft
Get into Hult International Business School

memory: User co-founded SmoothBallot, an e-election platform with under 500 initial users.
User is working on a case study called Loop, focused on tracking stolen or lost items through invisible tags.
User designed Tinybox UI, a minimal open-source UI kit.
User is building 'Haven' — a mental health app that lets people rant with AI-generated responses.
User believes in being unapologetically authentic online — bold, raw, and hard to ignore.
User prefers long-form, thought-provoking LinkedIn posts that push boundaries.
User’s design philosophy: Clarity > Cleverness. Every pixel should earn its place.

context_history.prompt: Why does safeStorageGet throw 'Extension context invalidated'?
context_history.response_summary: Explained that it happens when the Chrome extension reloads or loses context due to a manifest change.
Claude inserted context manually on button press, not automatically.
